ovdesc.p: MI Acct/Contract Value Date Ref BAL.MVMT.BVAL This file controls the building, and rebuilding of the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file. The various jobs which populate the BALANCE.MOVEMNET file with information reference this file to determine the build periods which the jobs will run through. Fields on this file are updated by these jobs when they run, and the running of such jobs are controlled via REBUILD.BAL.MVMT or from the batch process.

This is the earliest date from which the populate job needs to be run from in order to bring the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file up to date. When this field is blank it indicates that the account or contract has had no movements across it since the last time that the population job was run.
Standard T24 date field. This is a NOINPUT field.

This field holds the earliest date from which the calculation job needs to be run in order for the average balances on the BALANCE.MOVEMENT file to be brought up to date. When the contract or account has had the averages calculated up to date this field will hold yesterdays date.
Standard T24 date field. This is a NOINPUT field.

This is the key which uniquely identifies the records on the file, and may vary depending on the application which created the contract. For the majority of these appplications the key to this file will be the transaction reference used by the application, with the following exceptions: FOREX : The currency is appended to the key to differentiate between the two legs of the contract. SWAPS : The key used is that of the SWAP.BALANCES file to distinguish between the legs of the contract. SECURITIES : The id of the SC.TRADING.POSITION which the SEC.TRADE effects is used as the key.
Must be a valid record on the file.
This field holds the earliest date on which the account or contract has had a movement across it.
Standard T24 date field. This is a NOINPUT field.

This field holds the date from which the refinancing rate extraction will take place. It is not triggered by the normal T24 rate changing mechanisms. The date held in this field will be that of the earliest movement since the refinancing rate was last extracted. This date can be set idependently of the others.
Standard T24 date field. This is a NOINPUT field.
